## 描述 / Description

请简要描述此 Pull Request 的内容和目的。
Please briefly describe the content and purpose of this Pull Request.

## 变更类型 / Type of Change

请勾选适用的类型：
Please check the applicable types:

- [ ] Bug 修复 / Bug fix
- [ ] 新功能 / New feature
- [ ] 重大变更 / Breaking change
- [ ] 文档更新 / Documentation update
- [ ] 性能优化 / Performance improvement
- [ ] 代码重构 / Code refactoring
- [ ] 测试相关 / Test related
- [ ] 其他 / Other

## 相关 Issue / Related Issues

关闭（closes）或关联（references）的相关 Issue：
Issues that are closed or referenced by this PR:

Closes #<issue_number>

Describe how you tested this change:

- [ ] 添加了新的单元测试 / Added new unit tests
- [ ] 添加了新的集成测试 / Added new integration tests


## 检查清单 / Checklist

- [ ] 我已阅读项目的 [贡献指南](CONTRIBUTING.md) / I have read the project's [contributing guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] 代码遵循项目的代码风格 / Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] 我已对我的代码进行了自检 / I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] 代码已通过 `cargo clippy` 检查 / Code passes `cargo clippy`
- [ ] 代码已通过 `cargo fmt` 格式化检查 / Code passes `cargo fmt`
- [ ] 我已添加必要的测试 / I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] 所有测试通过 / All tests pass
- [ ] 新旧单元测试通过 / New and existing unit tests pass
- [ ] 依赖已更新（如需要）/ Dependencies updated if needed
- [ ] 文档已更新（如需要）/ Documentation updated if needed

## 额外说明 / Additional Notes

任何其他需要审阅者注意的信息：
Any other information that reviewers should be aware of:
